content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe the informal power used by the president in the scenario. In the context of the scenario, explain how the power described in part A could have impacted Congressional oversight. Explain how NASA could have impacted the implementation of the president’s agenda described in the scenario.

frqParts.text: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe the informal power used by the president in the scenario. topic.text: 2.4: Roles and Powers of the President

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
